name: Coelum
description:
Is a game about exploration. Exploration of a new world, of a strange culture, of a religion and its followers. Get a taste of Coelum as you talk to its inhabitants and explore its world.

Chance

In the 25th year of the Shenlang Emperor

Faith

Habbakar Xian, a convict, sole survivor of an orbital prison destroyed by a freak asteroid impact.

Community

In the belief God had saved him he would birth the catalyst of what would become holy planet Coelum

Website: Studio Pombe

Made by Ectho
